changes.description: The error message being shown to users when subscribing to push subscription failed due to the user declining to provide push permission previously consisted of an unclear string returned by the browser. This message was replaced with a proper error message alerting the user of the issue and how to fix it.

In the case where a user updated their settings while enabling push notifications, the alert message for one of those was suppressed by the following one. This caused error messages to be hidden even though they required user attention. The logic in the notifications service was updated to only display a success message if there isn't already an error message being shown.
